title: Episode 303 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode details including title, air dates, plot summary, production credits, and trivia. Used for core episode metadata and event details.

title: Boss Luffy Historical Special - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Comprehensive information about the Boss Luffy Historical Special arc, including episode list, setting details (Grand Jipangu, Edo period Japan), and character role descriptions in the alternate universe.

title: One Piece: Episode 303
author: animemiz
notes: Contemporary blog review from 2007 providing viewer perspective and plot details. Described the episode as 'quite cute' and noted character roles (Luffy as detective, Nami as restaurant owner, etc.). Mentioned Zoro being accidentally stolen with the tree.

title: Foxy - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character information for Foxy including voice actors (Bin Shimada - Japanese, Jonathan Brooks - English) and detailed Devil Fruit ability descriptions for Noro Noro no Mi.

title: Ninjin - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character profile for Ninjin including voice actors (Noriko Yoshitake - Japanese, Kate Oxley - English Funimation), physical description, birthday (February 2), age (9), affiliations (former Usopp Pirates member), and abilities.

title: Crazy Rainbow - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the opening song 'Crazy Rainbow' by Tackey & Tsubasa used in episodes 284-325. Documented the special April Fools' Day 2007 version in Episode 303 where the singing duo was animated into the opening alongside the Straw Hats.

title: One Piece Music - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Confirmed that Episode 303 did not have an ending theme, as Toei stopped airing endings from Episode 279 to Episode 1070 (a 17-year gap).

notes: Contextual information about Boss Luffy filler episodes appearing during the Enies Lobby arc from a first-time viewer perspective.

notes: Narrative analysis and trope identification for the Boss Luffy Historical arc episodes.

notes: Filler classification guide confirming Episode 303 as skippable filler content.

title: One Piece Filler List: All Episodes You Can Skip

title: One Piece episode 303 discussion
